positions.title: Strategy & BizOps / Product Marketing
positions.description_html:
STRATEGIC INITIATIVES

• Driving and guiding strategy taskforce teams for 2025 strategic planning
• Customer Health Score project: Ran cross-functional effort between CX and analytics team to create significantly improved scoring logic. Impact: Strategic metric used by diff teams - CX, product, marketing, entire business etc.
• Owned org wide “Data Governance Operating Model” project (#1 priority for Atlan). Impact on entire GTM to be strategic advisors to customers and impacting all key metrics.
• Drove Signals leadership offsite in San Francisco: Conducted “playing to win” analysis and “ICP” analysis to identify opps to bet for 2025
• Core part of “command of the message” (CotM) enablement team in Revenue KickOff ‘24

PRODUCT MARKETING

• Field Collateral: CoTM collaterals (incl. pitch deck), Prof. services deck, Partner decks, Individual deal-specific asks etc. Impact: Improve win rate
• Owner of Competitor Intel, Strategy & Enablement for entire org:
• Formulate takedown strategies. Impact: 70% + competitive win rate
• Create and maintain 20+ “compete cohort” SEO pages. Impact: Positive growth in SEO pipeline
• Built and maintain “Compete” repo on top competitors. Impact: Self serve repo for entire org
• Core contributor to Forrester Wave and Gartner Magic Quadrant reports. Impact: Won top leader positions in analyst reports.

BIZOPS

• Run AI in GTM experiments: Leveraged LLM to drive time-consuming analyses and automatic insight doc generation. Impact: 10x time efficiency
• Created and launched “super-activation” metric, a KPI for CX team. Impact: Indicator for identifying accounts for expansion
• Assist in 0-1 CX initiatives: Professional services scoping, Maturity assessments etc.

positions.subtitle: Atlan
positions.description: STRATEGY & INSIGHTS• Created a unique “voice of customer” system (aka Intel Engine) for first 100 closed won customers for informing GTM & product strategy.• Opp attribution journey analysis for marketing budget planning FY 23-24• Sales Competition in Q4 2022 (Best quarter in 2022): Our pod won with 136% attainment (I was the strat & insights guy)• Leadership Offsite '23: Main contributor in establishing Atlan's bulls-eye ICP diagram• Core contributor to pricing revamp project. Impact: Increased 4X average deal ARR by EoY• Regular engagements with our investors (Sequoia Capital, Insight Partners) on strategic projects like TAM sizing, new entrants market analysis etc.  • Part of weekly marketing, sales and CX GPS meeting with the leadership teamORG-WIDE PROJECTS• Owner of Competitor Intel, Strategy & Enablement for entire org. Impact: High 75% competitive win rate against our primary competitors• Drove foundational projects in evolution of value messaging of Atlan for GTM team    •  (H2 2022) Value Stream Mapping: Developed JTBD framework for communicating & quantifying value to customers. Impact - Great user interview tool in customer journey    •  (H1 2023) Owned org-wide project to develop standardised 11 use cases framework. Impact - Sales & marketing up-levelled value comms, Foundation for CS strategy & implementation playbook (incl. Atlan University)    •  (H2 2023) Owned org-wide “Command of the message” project (collab-ed with external firm). Impact: Up-level value comms with C-suite for GTM team• Owned org-wide project on “Unifying customer journey” between sales and CX via Atlan blueprint process. Impact: 50% reduction in customer onboarding time• Project Nike: Ran first ever sales enablement in Atlan. Codified sales process into master sales deck (~200 slides) & templates. Rolled out to team via Guru tool implementation.• Customer Advocacy: Published customer impact stories, from 5->60 (12x)
positions.title: Founder's Office (GTM)
positions.description_html:
STRATEGY & INSIGHTS

• Created a unique “voice of customer” system (aka Intel Engine) for first 100 closed won customers for informing GTM & product strategy.
• Opp attribution journey analysis for marketing budget planning FY 23-24
• Sales Competition in Q4 2022 (Best quarter in 2022): Our pod won with 136% attainment (I was the strat & insights guy)
• Leadership Offsite '23: Main contributor in establishing Atlan's bulls-eye ICP diagram
• Core contributor to pricing revamp project. Impact: Increased 4X average deal ARR by EoY
• Regular engagements with our investors (Sequoia Capital, Insight Partners) on strategic projects like TAM sizing, new entrants market analysis etc.
• Part of weekly marketing, sales and CX GPS meeting with the leadership team

ORG-WIDE PROJECTS

• Owner of Competitor Intel, Strategy & Enablement for entire org. Impact: High 75% competitive win rate against our primary competitors
• Drove foundational projects in evolution of value messaging of Atlan for GTM team
• (H2 2022) Value Stream Mapping: Developed JTBD framework for communicating & quantifying
value to customers. Impact - Great user interview tool in customer journey
• (H1 2023) Owned org-wide project to develop standardised 11 use cases framework. Impact - Sales & marketing up-levelled value comms, Foundation for CS strategy & implementation playbook (incl. Atlan University)
• (H2 2023) Owned org-wide “Command of the message” project (collab-ed with external firm). Impact: Up-level value comms with C-suite for GTM team
• Owned org-wide project on “Unifying customer journey” between sales and CX via Atlan blueprint process. Impact: 50% reduction in customer onboarding time
• Project Nike: Ran first ever sales enablement in Atlan. Codified sales process into master sales deck (~200 slides) & templates. Rolled out to team via Guru tool implementation.
• Customer Advocacy: Published customer impact stories, from 5->60 (12x)

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: Fully funded under the DAAD (WISE) fellowship, awarded to top 125 Indian students each year.• Project – Implement an advanced model based control strategy called nonlinear model predictive control (NMPC) for start-up of a highly nonlinear and dynamic methanation reactor in MATLAB.• Tasks – Optimised mesh discretisation of reactor model, checked compatibility of different optimisation techniques for NMPC, implemented the NMPC algorithm, briefly evaluated the potential of model order reduction and formulated a technical report.
experience.description_html: Fully funded under the DAAD (WISE) fellowship, awarded to top 125 Indian students each year.• Project – Implement an advanced model based control strategy called nonlinear model predictive control (NMPC) for start-up of a highly nonlinear and dynamic methanation reactor in MATLAB.• Tasks – Optimised mesh discretisation of reactor model, checked compatibility of different optimisation techniques for NMPC, implemented the NMPC algorithm, briefly evaluated the potential of model order reduction and formulated a technical report.
experience.company: Max Planck Institute for Dynamics of Complex Technical System

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: • Devised a novel NMPC algorithm in MATLAB where online support vector regression (machine learning method) provided the process model and differential evolution was used as optimiser.• Controlled the implemented systems 50% faster than the earlier methodologies.

publications: [{"title":"Smart Coating Based on Urea-Formaldehyde Microcapsules Loaded with Benzotriazole for Corrosion Protection of Mild Steel in 3.5 % NaCl","subtitle":"Russian Journal of Applied Chemistry","date":"December 26, 2018","description":"Urea-formaldehyde (UF) microcapsules loaded with linseed oil (LO) and benzotriazole (BTA) as core materials have been synthesized by in situ emulsion polymerization. The capsules were characterized by FTIR spectroscopy and particle size analysis. Surface morphology of the microcapsules was analyzed using scanning electron microscopy (SEM). The microcapsules were incorporated into epoxy resin and coated on a mild steel substrate to form a corrosion resistant organic coating. The self-healing property of coatings loaded with different weight % of microcapsules containing LO + BTA was tested by immersion of the UF coated mild steel specimens in 3.5 wt % NaCl solution. It was analyzed through visual inspection, weight loss measurements, and SEM of the scribed region of coating. It was observed that the addition of microcapsules enhances the corrosion resistance of the scratched samples."}]
